class.name: GDExample
class.description: GDExample is a demonstration class that shows how to create a custom GDExtension class with properties, methods, and process callbacks. It extends Sprite2D and includes examples of animation, timing, and method binding.

method.name: set_amplitude
method.description: Sets the amplitude value used for animations or calculations.

method.name: somar_dois_numeros
method.description: Example method that adds two numbers. Demonstrates how to create methods with parameters and return values that can be called from GDScript.

method.name: teste_um
method.description: Example test method demonstrating basic functionality. This is a test method that can be called from GDScript to verify the extension is working correctly.
